languages.text: "Умереть? Ха!" {n}Иремерисс обнажает оружие.{/n} "Сегодня умрешь только ты. Как только с этим будет покончено, я отправлюсь в реальный мир — взирать на страх и погибель, творимые руками моих слуг".

"Die? Ha!" {n}Yremeryss draws her weapon.{/n} "You are the only one who dies today. And after I am done with you, I will pay a visit to realspace — to observe the terror and ruin wrought by my Kabal."
languages.original_text: "Умереть? Ха!" {n}Иремерисс обнажает оружие.{/n} "Сегодня умрешь только ты. Как только с этим будет покончено, я отправлюсь в реальный мир — взирать на страх и погибель, творимые руками моих слуг".

traits.locale_text: "Die? Ha!" {n}Yremeryss draws her weapon.{/n} "You are the only one who dies today. After I am done with you, I will pay a visit to realspace — to observe the terror and ruin wrought by my Kabal."
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

traits.locale_text: "Die? Ha!" {n}Yremeryss draws her weapon.{/n} "You are the only one who dies today. After I am done with you, I will pay a visit to realspace — to observe the terror and ruin wrought by my Kabal."
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

traits.locale_text: "Die? Ha!" {n}Yremeryss draws her weapon.{/n} "You are the only one who dies today. And after I am done with you, I will pay a visit to realspace — to observe the terror and ruin wrought by my Kabal."
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

traits.locale_text: "Die? Ha!" {n}Yremeryss draws her weapon.{/n} "You are the only one who dies today. And after I am done with you, I will pay a visit to realspace — to observe the terror and ruin wrought by my Kabal."
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: « Mourir ? Ha ! {n}Yremeryss dégaine son arme.{/n} Vous serez {mf|le seul|la seule} à mourir aujourd'hui. Et quand j'en aurai terminé avec vous, j'irai faire un tour dans l'espace réel pour admirer de mes propres yeux le chaos semé par ma Kabale. »
languages.original_text: "Die? Ha!" {n}Yremeryss draws her weapon.{/n} "You are the only one who dies today. And after I am done with you, I will pay a visit to realspace — to observe the terror and ruin wrought by my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: « Mourir ? Ha ! {n}Yremeryss dégaine son arme.{/n} « Vous serez {mf|le seul|la seule} à mourir aujourd'hui. Et quand j'en aurai terminé avec vous, j'irai faire un tour dans l'espace réel pour admirer de mes propres yeux le chaos semé par ma Kabale. »
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: “受死？哈！”{n}伊芮梅莉斯拔出了武器。{/n}“会死的人只有你。等我解决了你之后，我会去真实世界一趟，亲眼看看我的阴谋团会带来怎样的恐怖与毁灭。”
languages.original_text: "Die? Ha!" {n}Yremeryss draws her weapon.{/n} "You are the only one who dies today. And after I am done with you, I will pay a visit to realspace — to observe the terror and ruin wrought by my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: “受死？哈！”{n}伊芮梅莉斯拔出了武器。{/n}“会死的人只有你。等我解决了你之后，我会去真实世界一趟，亲眼看看我的阴谋团会带来怎样的恐怖与毁灭。”
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: "Sterben? Ha!" {n}Yremeryss zieht ihre Waffe.{/n} "Ihr seid es, {mf|der|die} heute sterben wird. Und wenn ich mit Euch fertig bin, statte ich dem Realraum einen Besuch ab — um zu sehen, welche Zerstörung meine Kabale angerichtet hat."
languages.original_text: "Die? Ha!" {n}Yremeryss draws her weapon.{/n} "You are the only one who dies today. And after I am done with you, I will pay a visit to realspace — to observe the terror and ruin wrought by my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: "Sterben? Ha!" {n}Yremeryss zieht ihre Waffe.{/n} "Ihr seid es, {mf|der|die} heute sterben wird. Und wenn ich mit Euch fertig bin, statte ich dem Realraum einen Besuch ab — um zu sehen, welche Zerstörung meine Kabale angerichtet hat."
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: «¿Morir? ¡Ja!». {n} Yremeryss saca su arma.{/n} «Quien va a morir hoy eres tú. Y cuando acabe contigo, iré al espacio real para contemplar el terror y los destrozos provocados por mi Kábala».
languages.original_text: "Die? Ha!" {n}Yremeryss draws her weapon.{/n} "You are the only one who dies today. And after I am done with you, I will pay a visit to realspace — to observe the terror and ruin wrought by my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: «¿Morir? ¡Ja!». {n} Yremeryss saca su arma.{/n} «Quien va a morir hoy eres tú. Y cuando acabe contigo, iré al espacio real para contemplar el terror y los destrozos provocados por mi Kábala».
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: 「死ぬだと？ハハッ！」{n}イレメリスは武器を構える。{/n}「今日死ぬのはお前の方だ。お前が済んだら、私はリアルスペースを訪れる。我が陰謀団が巻き起こす恐怖と破滅をこの目で見届けてくれよう」
languages.original_text: "Die? Ha!" {n}Yremeryss draws her weapon.{/n} "You are the only one who dies today. And after I am done with you, I will pay a visit to realspace — to observe the terror and ruin wrought by my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: 「死ぬだと？ハハッ！」{n}イレメリスは武器を構える。{/n}「今日死ぬのはお前の方だ。お前が済んだら、私はリアルスペースを訪れる。我が陰謀団が巻き起こす恐怖と破滅をこの目で見届けてくれよう」
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit

languages.text: "Ölmek mi? Ha!" {n}Yremeryss silahını çekiyor.{/n} "Bugün ölecek olan tek kişi sensin. Seninle işim bittiğinde gerçekuzaya yollanacak ve Kabalımın meydana getirdiği dehşet ile yıkımı seyredeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Die? Ha!" {n}Yremeryss draws her weapon.{/n} "You are the only one who dies today. And after I am done with you, I will pay a visit to realspace — to observe the terror and ruin wrought by my Kabal."

traits.locale_text: "Ölmek mi? Ha!" {n}Yremeryss silahını çekiyor.{/n} "Bugün ölecek olan tek kişi sensin. Seninle işim bittiğinde de gerçekuzaya bir ziyarette bulunup Kabalımın meydana getirdiği dehşeti ve yıkımı seyredeceğim."
traits.speaker: Yremeriss_unit
